General.Name: Zhengzhou J and T Hi Tech Co
General.Description: Zhengzhou Jiean Hi-Tech Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, and technical services of computer simulation training systems in rail transit, emergency safety, and other fields in China. The company focuses on system simulation, virtual reality, and augmented reality technology in the field of virtual simulation education, and training. Zhengzhou Jiean Hi-Tech Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Zhengzhou, China.

3.Name: Ms. Jianling  Li
3.Title: Chairman of the Supervisory Board & Head of the Audit Department
